techmeme.title: Google makes Gems, its personalized Gemini chatbots, free for all users and offers several premade Gems including Career guide and Coding partner (Pranob Mehrotra/Android Authority)
Adobe's stock falls 12%+ after reporting a disappointing Q2 outlook and investor concerns that it is falling behind some rivals and losing its AI advantage (CNBC)
Google says Gemini can now personalize answers based on users' search history, available as an experimental feature to Gemini and Gemini Advanced subscribers (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Google says Gemini users can now try Deep Research for free in 45+ languages and the tool is now powered by Gemini 2.0 Flash (Igor Bonifacic/Engadget)
Google adds new developer tools and programs to simplify PC game porting to Android and improves Vulkan support on Android, ahead of the GDC (Mishaal Rahman/Android Authority)
